title: Ep 81: Dessert Person with Claire Saffitz
itunes:title: Ep 81: Dessert Person with Claire Saffitz
itunes:subtitle: Kate talks turning 40, Doree discusses her success working with a financial coach, and they both share some of their fave vegetarian recipes. Then they welcome Gourmet Makes host Claire Saffitz, who details her journey to becoming a recipe-testing YouT...
description:
Kate talks turning 40, Doree discusses her success working with a financial coach, and they both share some of their fave vegetarian recipes. Then they welcome Gourmet Makes host Claire Saffitz, who details her journey to becoming a recipe-testing YouTube star, growing from your failures, and the joys of making time for yourself.


Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in our Facebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • The Art of Racing In The Rain - Pre-sale starts July 25th. In theaters August 9th.
  • FIGS - For 15% your first order, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER.
  • Buffy - For $20 off your Buffy comforter, visit Buffy.co and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • LOLA - To save 40% off your first month’s subscription, go to mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Birchbox - Get $5 off your first Birchbox when you go to birchbox.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • Frank & Oak - Head to frankandoak.com/forever35 to try Style Plan and get $25 off your first subscription box.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
